nodes.text: The Enhancement D-package artificially enhanced the wearer's muscle mass and motor control, resulting in an increase of strength that was advantageous in melee combat. The technology of D-Package implants had the consequence of rendering them larger and more intrusive than other types. Thus, they tended to have more impressive effects, but could only be used by very healthy individuals.
In the game, the playable character must have a constitution attribute of 18 or higher.
